has research problem.from sentence: Semantic Relation Classification via Bidirectional LSTM Networks with Entity - aware Attention using Latent Entity Typing

has research problem: Classifying semantic relations between entity pairs in sentences

has research problem.from sentence: Classifying semantic relations between entity pairs in sentences is an important task in Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) .

has research problem: predicting a semantic relationship between two tagged entities in a sentence

has research problem.from sentence: A task of relation classification is defined as predicting a semantic relationship between two tagged entities in a sentence .
